---
category: news
title: "Single-cell approaches and deep learning to map all stages of fruit fly embryo development"
excerpt: "Using the fruit fly, scientists have constructed a complete and detailed single-cell map of embryo development. This research will also help scientists pursue questions like how mutations lead to different developmental defects and provides a path to understand the vast non-coding part of our genome that contains most disease-associated mutations."
